description: This is an interactive, hands on course where you will be coached through the steps of setting up a consulting company. You will learn the ABC's of setting up a consulting company from determining the structure of your business to how to set your fees. This course will show you exactly how to use the five step consulting process with your clients, and includes sample forms and documents that you can use to get started. Lastly, you will learn how to market your services, and find clients.
title: Become a Consultant in 5 Steps
